overview: Playing in the snow can be real good fun, but would anything truthfully compare to the opportunity of getting together with a gang of your favorite fuck-buddies for a hot, horny session of raw cock action? Certainly this bunch of horny Czech playmates don’t appear to think so, that’s for sure, as Staxus favorites Rudy Valentino and Brad Fitt lead an all-star cast of cock-crazed twinks in search of the next heated fuck. Get ready, folks, for the hottest winter of your life.
title: Snow Patrol
